summary: All new colorful textures on dragons in HD
descriptionHtml:
HD IS MADE BY x70x. THANKS AGAIN FOR PREMISSION TO USE THE TEXTURES. 


Alduin is not included, I will update with him later. Othawiig may be remade, depends on comments. 

If you dont like some of the re textures, then you can go into the folder named actors and find the .dds files that you don\'t like and delete them. After that install as normal.

Red/Light blue is Swamp dragon
Light blue is snow dragon
Yellow turquoise (bronze) is earth dragon
Orange/turquoise (copper) is dragon boss
Green/Orange is dragon
Darker red/blue is Odaviig
author: Luddemann
